body_html: Hey, first of all I appreciate all you guys are doing. I've got a workaround to this issue that I'm using right now (writing to disk), but I'm wondering if this is an issue that can be easily resolved in one of the upcoming releases. I've tested through '0.4.0'.

body: Hey, first of all I appreciate all you guys are doing. I've got a workaround to this issue that I'm using right now (writing to disk), but I'm wondering if this is an issue that can be easily resolved in one of the upcoming releases. I've tested through '0.4.0'.
